name: Papoti
overview:
Papoti is a interactive social networking platform simulating a party to meet a business partner.

Welcome to Papoti,

Papoti is a social environment which simulates a party, which you would attend with the aim of finding a business partner. At a party you can spend much of the time introducing yourself to people, answering the same questions over and over again. Despite this time wasting repetition, you can also find yourself speaking to many people that aren’t of interest to you, don’t require the expertise that you may have among various other options. At Papoti we put you in touch with the people most suitable for you, the people that want what you want and the people that would work well to you. Not only does Papoti give you these contacts, but it gives you a way to communicate with them, without having to give away contact details to people that you may not wish to be in contact with at a later stage.

When you are starting a business we understand that you have many things on your mind, such as who your audience will be, how you can perfect your product. We know that you don’t want to hassle and problems caused with having to find third party providers for services that you may have to spend hours researching and looking up. Papoti provides a list of recommended services that are there to give you a quality service. These range from creating a website, to accountancy, from providing office space to an external HR department, Papoti has it all, or we can find this for you.

Papoti provides a platform where you can fill in as much or as little information as you wish - although the more information you provide the more chances you have of meeting your perfect match - when you find businesses that appeal to you, you are then able to speak to representatives of the businesses that you choose to.
